lines: 1. Bushe Yesu kuti ansunga, Ilyo ndi mu macusho?
'Lyo nafininwa ne fya mu calo, Fyalenge nshilo kulepa
Inshiku nasho shanasha, Mupusushi wandi alansunga.
2. Bushe Yesu kuti ansunga, Nge nshila yafitisha?
Kasuba kawa, yaise mfifi, Bushe kuti aba pepe?
3. Bushe Yesu kuti ansunga, Nga nawa mumatunko?
Ilyo na cula, nshili no bwafwo, Nalila bushiku bonse.
4. Bushe Yesu kuti ansunga, Nga nasha 'ba mu calo?
Nangu mutima wandi wa cula, Bushe tekuti amone?
